command.description: Open a symbol in a TypeScript editor.

command.description: Toggles mark occurrences in TypeScript editors

project-facet.description: Adds support for writing applications using TypeScript programming language. Currently supported TypeScript version is 1.8.10.
project-facet.label: TypeScript
